description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- Improvement: Instruments in the "Follow-up" widget are now grouped by date and type for better clarity.
- Improvement: CSV import now also supports time in ISO format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm.
- Improvement: The "Balance" column is now color-coded depending on whether the balance is positive or negative (instead of whether the transaction increases or decreases the value).
- Improvements to the PDF importers for Arkea Direct Bank, Swissquote, DKB, Trade Republic, ING-DiBa, Consorsbank, C24 Bank, ABN AMRO, akf bank, N26, Raiffeisenbank, Audi Bank, Saxo, and PhrozenByte.
- Fix: Corrected an issue with trade assignment during multiple portfolio transfers of a position.
